title: What U.S. cities offer 5G cellphone services? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every US city with a population of over 500,000 has at least one 5G cell site operated by each of the major wireless operators. They set up at least one 5G cell site in large metropolitan areas to be legally able to advertise they have nationwide coverage and in some cases claim they can cover a large percentage of the population. To experience 5G you need a 5G capable device, be in range of the cell site and have a subscription with the service provider transmitting 5G.

This varies very much by provider. Some cities that “have” 5G only have it in a form that works outdoors in a small neighborhood. Only expect your phone to work if you get a model of a phone specifically approved by a provider, for a band available in the cities you care about, and a matching service plan. See Here's every U.S. city with 5G coverage right now
